content: embark on a cosmic crochet journey with our newest pattern the little astronaut amigurumi this adorable space explorer is the perfect addition to your amigurumi collection grab your yarn and hooks and let s create a tiny astronaut ready for intergalactic adventures **materials** - milk cotton yarn 2 5mm - crochet hook 2 75 3mm - fiberfill sewing needle scissors **permitted use** you can sell items made from these patterns/tutorial videos a small quantity of fewer than 50 products/month provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling ** pattern by amivui studio ** https //amivuistudio com/ i would love to see your ﬁnished doll so please share the picture with me tag me @amivuistudio and use the hashtags #amivuistudio and #amivui on instagram let us know if you have a specific question or give an idea of what you re looking for we re happy to make recommendations **check out our other products** https //shop amiguworld com/ 1 **contact** contact us via email amivuistudio@gmail com ⁠ᵔ⁠ᴥ⁠ᵔ⁠ 1 https //shop amiguworld com/
